answerText: "The Red Wheelbarrow"[10] Williams was part of this poetic movement, which focuses on using sharp language to create a powerful sensation. Other members of this movement include H.D. and Amy Lowell.
heading: DRAGOON |2013 | 13 | 6 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: It describes an object that is "glazed with rainwater, beside the white chickens." For 10 points each: [10] Name this short poem by William Carlos Williams.
